Actions.Name: Get properties of a Data Exchange
Actions.Description: This operation gets the properties of a Data Exchange. You can specify to get all the properties or only the latest properties.

Actions.Name: Get details of a Data Exchange property
Actions.Description: This operation gets details of a property associated with a Data Exchange.

Actions.Name: Get details about a Data Exchange
Actions.Description: This operation gets details about a Data Exchange such as its Autodesk Docs project name, author of the file, and the last modified time, etc.

Actions.Name: When a Data Exchange is created
Actions.Description: This operation triggers a flow when a Data Exchange is created.

Actions.Name: When a Data Exchange is updated
Actions.Description: This operation triggers a flow when a Data Exchange is updated.
